content.c_answer2: Cabaret is 2 hours 45 minutes (inl. interval). Performances starting at 2:00pm finish at approx. 4:45pm, and performances starting at 7:30pm finish at approx. 10:15pm.
content.name: How long is Cabaret and when does it finish?
content.question: How long is Cabaret and when does it finish?
